title: Hereâ€™s what message reactions on WhatsApp could look like on release
content:
WhatsApp has been working on iMessage/Instagram-style message reactions for a while now. We first learned about it all the way back in August last year. At the time, the feature was in early development. A few months later, WhatsApp rolled out a half-baked version of the feature to some users, only to remove it later

The post Here’s what message reactions on WhatsApp could look like on release appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WABetainfo has shared some images of WhatsApp reactions, giving us an early preview of what the feature would look like once it goes live.
